definitions.definition: To catch the ball in a baseball mitt .
examples: He gloved the line drive for the third out.

definitions.definition: To put a glove or gloves on.
examples: Maxwell gloved his hand so that he wouldn't leave fingerprints, then pulled the trigger.

definitions.definition: To touch (a delivery ) with one's glove while the gloved hand is on the bat. Under the rules of cricket, the batsman is deemed to have hit the ball.

main_definition: ( baseball , transitive ) To catch the ball in a baseball mitt .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To put a glove or gloves on.
( cricket ) To touch (a delivery ) with one's glove while the gloved hand is on the bat. Under the rules of cricket, the batsman is deemed to have hit the ball.
